CFID-90: Add support for existing password check in changePassword.

A SecurityContextAccesor supplies the information on whether the
invocation is being made by a user on their behalf and requires
that they supply the old password in this case and that it matches
the current stored value.

CFID-67: Add bcrypt to password storage and authentication.

JDBC SCIM code now uses a bcrypt password encoder to hash
passwords before storing them. AuthzAuthenticationManager also
uses bcrypt by default, so will now only work with DBs containing
hashed passwords.
